channel.title: -Item- Has been dropped

item.title: -Item- Has been dropped
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

Well, currently I am editing some bosses and I want to make it so if there is a certain Item, such as a BGS, it will say:

BGS was dropped by the ----

I already have the monster name, I just need to know how to announce itâ€¦

Ths is the code i completely pulled out of my ass:

if (npcs[NPCID].npcType == 1160) { if (ItemHandler.addItem(item2.randomKQ() == 15334)) { PlayerHandler.messageToAll = "BGS was just dropped by the KQ"; }

Any ideas?

Read full topic
